type.name: org.gradle.jvm.JvmApiSpec
type.description:
Specifies the packages that constitute the API of a library. Facilitates separation of API and implementation binaries for that library. Backing object for the {}} DSL.
@since 2.10

method.name: dependencies
method.description: Specify the dependencies of this API.

method.name: exports
getExports
method.description: The set of packages that comprise this library's public API.

property.name: exports
property.description: The set of packages that comprise this library's public API.
